nodes.text: The Zadaria system was located in the Gateworlds, an area of the Hapes Cluster in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim. It was connected via hyperlanes to the Febrini and Phelope systems. The Zadaria system was the origin point of the beverage known as Zadarian brandy.
The Zadaria system was introduced in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-9.
